name: GCRotationRate
desc: A structure that represents rotation rates around the x, y, and z axes.

items.name: init(x: Double, y: Double, z: Double)
items.desc: Creates a rotation rate structure with the specified values.

items.name: var x: Double
items.desc: The rotation rate around the x-axis in radians per second.

items.name: var y: Double
items.desc: The rotation rate around the y-axis in radians per second.

items.name: var z: Double
items.desc: The rotation rate around the z-axis in radians per second.
